comment.author: 96683394@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Passover: why is this group different? why four cups? why matzo?, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 56970421@N06
comment._content:
Hello

I'm the great great son of Hugo brill, where I can see this picture? do you have more?

Please can you contact me at lionel.mouchabac@gmail.com

comment.author: 56083368@N02
comment._content:
Dear Mlionelm,

I will contact you regarding the material we have on Hugo  Brill. You are also welcome to write me at msimonson@lbi.cjh.org.  I am out of the office today, but will return on Monday.  You should also click on the link to CJH Archives and Library Catalog above, type in the name Hugo Brill, and see what else you find.

Michael Simonson
Archivist
Leo Baeck Institute

comment.author: 56083368@N02
comment._content:
Dear Gifted Photographer,

I know I am getting back to you extremely late, but you are welcome to add any of our photographs to your group "Passover: why is this group different? Why four cups?  Why matzo?"

Michael Simonson
Archivist
Leo Baeck Institute

comment.author: 36988361@N08
comment._content: Dear Mlionelm, I did not find anymore material on Hugo Brill offhand, but I only did a few fast searches. Please feel free to consult our online catalog at www.lbi.org. (Click on "Search Online Catalog"). Using names, locations, and other terms, you can begin to try to find more information about your family that we might have in our archives. Sincerely, Michael Simonson Archivist Leo Baeck Institute
